See the zoom recording for the first data dive [here](https://teachinglab-org.zoom.us/rec/share/iGc5K0lUuaOTB_6ljr2Hq-k3OZedl7RaKNd9RRRcsr5SQdWOHKx2abUA33aubXsi.0UcB36vA32xWQdDW).

```{r guskey-framework, echo = F}
library(bs4cards)
galleries3 <- data.frame(
  long_name = c(
    "Behind the Numbers: What We Measure & Why",
    "Course Assessments: How We Know We're Increasing Participant Knowledge"
  ),
  blurb = c(
    "Teaching Lab's first data dive!",
    "Duncan, Ching, and Omar dive deep and get meta on participant knowledge quizzes"
  ),
  image_url = c(
    here::here("Images/data_dives/data_dive_1.png"),
    here::here("Images/data_dives/data_dive_2.png")
  ),
  link = c(
    "https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1n8k5ZqgUwQESjxcgzJ8E7CFNRVevssX-gyUgmealKnU/edit#slide=id.p",
    "https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1XvrtVlVVnz3b1Sr-_xdkYq2vV7eogtZ0feI3KHYyXO8/edit"
  ),
  label_colour = c("#c4d8e2", "#c4d8e2")
)

galleries3 |>
  cards(
    title = long_name,
    text = blurb,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    layout = "label-below",
    width = 2,
    border_radius = 5,
    spacing = 3,
    label_colour = label_colour
  )
```

See the zoom recording for the second data dive [here](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/17aIskSziSPidP4YbUjhkQL-uARv2XSP8).
